Title: Twitt - Windows Phone 7 Twitter App
Description: This is a full Windows Phone 7 Twitter sample app, that I've been blogging about on http://samjarawan.blogspot.com.  This project teaches how to use oAuth to authenticate a twitter account on a Windows Phone 7 application as well as how to use the Twitter APIs using Hammock.
HomeWiki:
Twitt is a Windows Phone 7 sample Twitter application. This application is used to demonstrate using oAuth on Windows Phone as well as creating a 'real' Twitter app for Windows Phone 7.

Details on the coding can be found at the following Blog : http://samjarawan.blogspot.com
